website_summaries.verdict: Fine crystal by Waterford is hard to beat for quality and elegance.
pros: Comes in a nice gift box
cons: These flutes cost a little more than other comparable models on the market

customer_reviews.title: Lovely flutes, damaged display box
customer_reviews.text: I regularly give Waterford flutes as a wedding gift because the beautiful glasses in a luxury display box makes a elegant presentation. These flutes are lovely and high quality. However, the display box was sloppily taped closed with ugly packing tape. I can not remove it without tearing the box. It’s disappointing to have to give this as a gift when the black Waterford storage box is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: PLP

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter's wedding gift. The presentation box is damaged. I hate to have to give it to her and our new son-in-law this way, but there probably isn't time for an exchange....so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.Demaree

customer_reviews.title: Extremely elegant and beautiful set! I loved the presentation from the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely elegant and beautiful set! I loved the presentation from the box it comes in and to the flutes themselves!! I gave it as a gift to my bestfriend as her wedding gift and she and her husband loved it!!!! The beauty that these flutes are, they are definitely worth the dollars. I would definitely suggested and recommend and maybe rebuy if I ever need to buy a gift for another wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a wedding gift. They are absolutely beautiful and they come packaged so nicely. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kay M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my best friend and her future husband for her bridal shower. They came in the velvet lined cushioned box and they are absolutely beautiful. I am very pleased. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: 15th Wedding Anniversary gift!
customer_reviews.text: The recipients loved this as their 15th Wedding Anniversary gift. They are really pretty! I wish engraving was offered via the Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AtekamT

customer_reviews.title: Broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I thought they looked beautiful. The bride opened and pulled the glass out and the back was completely cracked... how do I return for a new one?
customer_reviews.author: Logon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter who loves Waterford. She loved these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzonne

customer_reviews.title: A Toast to the Bride and Groom
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a set of these from a well known department store for a much higher price. They arrived in a ripped, non-waterford box - certainly not suitable for gifting. These arrived quickly and in the lovely Waterford Box. I am very pleased with the purchase, as are the happy couple.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: These were a beautiful wedding gift for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: These flute glasses arrived well packaged and on time. They are beautiful and were definitely enjoyed at my daughter's wedding. I am sure they will use them for many special occasions throughout the years.
customer_reviews.author: Charm Lover

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful and great packaging!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use as toasting flutes for our wedding and they are absolutely gorgeous! Also, the packaging is so great and I do not see a way that they would be able to break in transit! Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful, and boxed nicely as well... Made a perfect wedding gift along with a bottle of Dom.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: The glasses arrived as scheudled, well packaged in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived as scheudled, well packaged in the original box. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Glasow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely gorgeous. The photo doesn't do them justice!
customer_reviews.author: lo-glow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the box these came in! Beautiful pieces; exactly what I had hoped for! I’d love to buy a few matching cocktail glasses next.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Howard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a wedding toast. They are prettier than I thought they would be. There is no substitute for Waterford crystal champagne flutes.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela L. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: They are truly beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I always get these glasses for family and friends that are getting married. Give for the engagement and have them drink their champagne toast at their wedding. Have to remember to have someone take them home. They are beautiful and they can always add to their collection.
customer_reviews.author: ruth baldovin

customer_reviews.title: A great wedding gift.
customer_reviews.text: My friend’s daughter used these at her wedding for the first toast.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D. Seawright

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT WEDDING GIFT
customer_reviews.text: The flutes are beautiful and were a perfect addition to the head table at my daughter and son-in-law's wedding reception.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but substantial
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful flutes purchased for our 30th wedding anniversary. Were engraved with names, making a spectacular presentation. Flute feels substantial, and comes in a storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful heirloom flutes
customer_reviews.text: I gave these flutes as a wedding gift. The flutes are beautiful and nicely boxed.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Ann Stastny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wedding gift for my son and his lovely bride.
customer_reviews.author: ejago1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous Flutes... Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely gorgeous! The flutes came packed in a really good gift box. The crystal is great quality. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: fountainshead

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packed in beautiful boxes. The cuts on these glasses absolutely georgous.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dohr

customer_reviews.title: We are very satisfied with the product that we received from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Waterford quality speaks for itself. We are very satisfied with the product that we received from Amazon. Our Waterford is in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jean Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flutes
customer_reviews.text: These flutes were simply beautiful and came in a very elegant box, perfect for gift giving. They make a wonderful wedding gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Enright

customer_reviews.title: She loved them.
customer_reviews.text: The flutes were a shower gift for my niece. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Deemer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an engagement gift. It is truly more beautiful than pictured. The recipients were thrilled to receive these flutes!
customer_reviews.author: Bette249

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I’m excited to present this to my husband for our anniversary and New Years! We will drink veuve out of these beautiful glasses thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small Crack
customer_reviews.text: Everything was beautiful except there was a small crack at the bottom of one of my new glasses. I am returning and buying again in hopes of unbroken glasses!
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Waterford says it all.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in a very nice box, excellent presentation. They are heavy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: John Curry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my wedding toast
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wedding to be used as our toasting glasses and they are beautiful! They arrived in a Waterford box with the foam inserts. High quality and heavy-these are real Waterford glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous flutes...extremely elegant! Close, but not quite what I'm looking for as a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses for celebrating
customer_reviews.text: Going to celebrate our 20th with these...Waterford class and style..
customer_reviews.author: james a bayers

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beyond gorgeous and come in a keepsake box. Perfect for the wedding gift I am about to give.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful and the box was very high class for displaying the glasses
customer_reviews.author: Chris
